high_descs: Walk forward, turn right, walk forward, turn right, stand in front of the basket ball.
Pick up the basket ball from the floor.
Turn around, walk forward, stand in front of the garbage can.
Raise the ball up high into the air.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the basketball from the floor to hold it above the trash can.

high_descs: Walk towards the white box on the floor, turn right towards the the basketball on the floor.
Pick up the basketball on the floor.
Turn around, walk towards the metal bin on the right.
Lift the basketball up while facing the bin on the floor.
anns.task_desc: Attempt to throw the basketball into the bin.

high_descs: walk forwards towards the box, turn right, walk across to the wall, turn right
pick up the basketball that is on the floor
turn right, walk forward, turn right after the desk
hold ball up to the lamp, turn the lamp on
anns.task_desc: examine a basketball with a lamp
